channel.title: A few bug reports
channel.description:
#### Decide Fate disabled, Cult Leader bleed randomly disabled, the victim of Hunter's Mark got the feedback that they were attacked, but not the feedback that they were occupied
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
Regarding Hunter's Mark I was Alchemist with Stoneskin and attacked Inquisitor. I got, "You attacked X last night" feedback, and "You were attacked but immune" feedback. I was hit by Hunter's Mark so the feedback I should have gotten "You were occupied" instead of "You attacked X last night".
"You attacked X last night" wasn't true since I was occupied, and also Inquisitor is death immune anyway so I would have gotten a death immune message.
#### Steps to reproduce:
Attack someone as Alch when you get hit by Hunter's Mark.
